website_summaries.verdict: The Synology DiskStation DS216+II is a whisper-quiet two-bay NAS device that offers good file transfer performance, 4K video transcoding, and a generous selection of apps. It's a breeze to set up and manage.
cons: Does not come with storage drives

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very good unit, basic but does job perfectly, should have taken a higher level model.
customer_reviews.author: Allan

customer_reviews.title: Nice NAS
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for my WD MyCloudMirror that gradually became useless due to disconnections. Love this bit of kit. Been using for a couple of months now and does everything well. Would buy again and probable will when I fill it up !
customer_reviews.author: Brian Knight

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: Unlike previous cheap NAS drives I've bought, this unit is easy to set up, and is quick. I'm getting backup data transfer rates of 5 - 6 Gb/minute, which is fantastic. I've set up a Timemachine partition, which works well, and the remote access also seems to be good. Overall, recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Gordon Mckenzie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: juts what the IT guy said it would and more
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kjp Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Ripped me off
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like it and they issue me only 4 GBP on refund rather than full amount of 262 GBP... Ripping off people
customer_reviews.author: Waleed Bin Aamir

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hardware and software combination.
customer_reviews.text: Have been using Synology for my clients for years and they just keep getting better. Espically with the new Additions of the software that is in beta right now. This device is great for the home users that need storage and productivity, along with its easy connection to many offsite replication sites "Amazon Glacier" you can replicated data for fraction of the cost and its all automatic. Wonderful hardware and support and will continue to use for all my clients and my home. Always get WD Red NAS drives for them and never have an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Justin P.

customer_reviews.title: Great products.  Work great for Network Backups.
customer_reviews.text: We have been using Synology for several years for client backups and have hundreds of these installed. We use them in combination with Western Digital Red drives. Easy setup and very reliable. There was 1 failure to a unit about 2-years ago that Synology easily remedied.
customer_reviews.author: Computer Business Consultants, Inc

customer_reviews.title: Good NAS Solution.
customer_reviews.text: Fairly easy to install and works as expected. Timely delivery too.
customer_reviews.author: Old Jeeper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Completely met all expectations. I hope to use it many years without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Dregoric

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love synology - pricey but works very well. let's see how long it lasts
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Your own Cloud !!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product!!! Very useful to synchronize all your files between your computers, tablet, and phone...
customer_reviews.author: Antonio S

customer_reviews.title: so easy to use and configure for the extra cost
customer_reviews.text: this product works as advertised for the cost. so easy to use and configure for the extra cost!
customer_reviews.author: krusty

customer_reviews.title: Synology NAS devices are #1
customer_reviews.text: Had this for about a month. It's our second Synology. Easy setup and much quicker than our old one (DS110j). I love that I can mirror two drives. Highly recommend Synology.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good NAS, Bad Plex
customer_reviews.text: While it doesn't say it is capable to run Plex, it is possible to install it. Unfortunately it is not a good choice for a Plex server. My D-Link camera's are also not supported by the security station so I really just bought a slightly overpriced NAD with extra features that do not meet my needs. YMMV
customer_reviews.author: Grimor

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with Quickbooks
customer_reviews.text: Does not work with Quickbooks. That's what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Lane

customer_reviews.title: Log in Nightmare
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciate Confounder's comments. I can' even log in to mine. There are so many login in details and passwords and agreesments and disclaimers it is an absolute maze of administration. The log in pages offers no help...no click to update password, or "Forgot User Name". I am totally frustrated with the darn thing!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Sidney Baynes

customer_reviews.title: avoid synology if you value your time and sanity
customer_reviews.text: The only other bit of software that comes even close to this for user unfriendliness is Blender (which is free and until a few years ago made no claims about ease of use). My buyers regret is immense. If you just want it as an entertainment server then it will do. To use it for business or anything else even remotely complex is asking for trouble and will require you to spend an awful lot of time and trouble to try to get it to work as it you want it. Whoever designed this should hang their heads in shame.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa

product_meta.title: Synology DS216 2 Bay Desktop NAS Enclosure
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Enclosure| Capacity:EnclosureSynology DS216 is a 2-bay NAS that brings you the best cost/value ratio yet with no compromising on the performance and feature. Equipped with a dual-core CPU, Synology DS216 delivers a outstanding read/write performance with an average speed over 111.18 MB/s in reading and over 112.79 MB/s in writing under RAID 1 configuration in a Windows environment.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Synology Disk Station DS216 - NAS server - SATA 6Gb/s - RAID 0, 1, JBOD - Gigabit Ethernet - iSCSI
feature_bullets: Dual-core CPU with hardware encryption engine
USB Copy Button for easy data transmission

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars41 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
